name: HOLD_OUT_VALIDATION
desc: Split datasets into random train and test subsets

parameters.name: pathology
parameters.desc: The name of the pathology that the dataset belongs to.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.desc: It contains the names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed.

parameters.name: x
parameters.desc: Independent variables: A list of variables from database. The variable should be Real, Integer or String. The variable can be either numerical or categorical. It cannot be empty

parameters.name: y
parameters.desc: Dependent variable: A variable form database. The variable should be Real, Integer or String. It should be categorical. It cannot be empty

parameters.name: test_size
parameters.desc: If float, should be between 0.0 and 1.0 and represent the proportion of the dataset to include in the test split. If int, represents the absolute number of test samples. If None, the value is set to the complement of the train size. If train_size is also None, it will be set to 0.25.

parameters.name: train_size
parameters.desc: If float, should be between 0.0 and 1.0 and represent the proportion of the dataset to include in the train split. If int, represents the absolute number of train samples. If None, the value is automatically set to the complement of the test size.

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.desc: It is the seed used by the random number generator; It can be empty

parameters.name: shuffle
parameters.desc: Whether or not to shuffle the data before splitting. It can be True,False or None
